name: Kismet's Intertwined
description:
An endless runner about two people in different dimensions but fated to only one outcome. You'll be controlling both the characters in the upper world and the lower world. Try to not get hit by cars by getting out of their way or by jumping over them.

Controls:

W / D to move Left or Right

SpaceBar to Jump

Tips:

- collect coins to get better scores.

- turn off camera swaying in the upper right corner of the main menu.

- turn on hardware acceleration on Chrome browser for better experience on the HTML version of the game.

Credits:

red arrow sfx (heal spell) - DoKashiteru

player hit by car (explosion) - Michel Baradari
